content: 99.co Event Investments HDB BTO Property Asked by AnonymousAsked on 24 May 2019I am in the phase of getting married soon. Should I be prioritising getting a BTO or investing in a property? Limited money so can only choose one. Which one should I prioritise?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 24 May 2019It really depends on your situation. Do you want to stay with your wife-to-be? If yes, do you have a place to stay with her? If you're staying in your parent's house, are the both of you comfortable with sharing the house with the parents?If you answered no to the questions, then I would strongly suggest getting a BTO. No point sacrificing the comfort of a home for some material gains.0 comments0
